data.title: Outstanding Burgers
data.text:
When we think fast-food burgers, this is where we go.
Lots of selections and variety and that great Texas taste. You can't miss with Whataburger!

data.title: New, Just open
data.text: Now don't get me wrong I love new. Clean, fresh, beautiful and best of all just blocks from were i live. Am happy with it and the food is good. Yes their's a but it's new and every one is trying to get in their. So if you like Whataburger please come to this one but you may wont to wait a month or so to come to this one. That way you wont have such a long wait to get your food.

data.title: Late night trucking hunger.
data.text: Stopped by Whataburger to satisfy my late night hunger while driving through. Very clean restaurant and bathroom. Ordered double Whataburger with myo and ketchup instead of mustard. Washed it down with an ice cold coke. Carlos the cashier and cook was very friendly and got my order done in recored time. Overall great food and a great service.

data.title: Awesome food, great cashier
data.text:
We were visiting from out of town and since we lived in the area before, we know how amazing Whataburger is and wish we had it back home. We came in to get a late dinner. Our food was awesome and it was ready very quickly. The restaurant was so clean.

Our cashier, Berenice, was so polite, fast, and helpful. It's rare to come across someone so courteous in an environment like this. Awesome visit! Thank you!

data.title: Great burger
data.text: I think they have the best burger in town for the money. Always great and always the same great quality. Been eating at what's burger since I was a kid and I'm a senior citizen.

data.title: Good burger, friendly people, clean location
data.text: Excellent burger and very friendly staff!  This was my second trip to this location, and the burger never disappoints.  My son had the chicken bites and a strawberry shake and loved every bite (his ranch dressing was soooo good!).  I'm not a big fan of their fries, but I'm not a fan of fries in general.  The restaurant was clean, with good food, and friendly people.  That's often hard to find in fast food restaurants these days.  A return visit is a definite possibility!

data.title: It's a burger joint....
data.text: A burger, jr. burger,  fries and root beer shake. $11. Not outstanding, just okay. Staff not over friendly, but average.

data.title: disappointed
data.text: lines were too long.  the whole night from 8pm until 2am ridiculous and emabarrasing to my guest traveling out of the state

data.title: What-A-Burger indeed!
data.text:
We went here on a late Friday night burger run and ordered a bacon and cheese whataburger, a whataburger Jr., fries, and onion rings.  It was pretty busy for a Friday night!  Despite that and our order being very specific, they managed to get all the food out in a timely manner with no mistakes.

My girl and I disagree a bit on what to rate this place - I thought it was one of the best fast food burger joints, if not THE best, that I have tried, while she didn't think quite that highly but still liked - we settled on a score of "4".  My burger had a decent amount of fresh toppings and the meat patty was much thicker than you would see at a McDonald's or Burger King.  Biggest fast food burger I have eaten and it was delicious.  The fries were ok, I've had better but also had worse.  A Whataburger Jr. was still a pretty good size, rivaling McDonald's normal size burger but MUCH better.  Onion rings were great and prefer them over the fries.

We'll be back to this location if we want a fast, affordable, quality burger!

data.title: Best hamburgers anywhere!!
data.text:
I have eaten at all the hamburger joints and, although it's not a "joint," Whataburgers has the best tasting hamburgers you can find and you can customize them.  When I was single I rewarded myself after church with a Double Meat hamburger, fries, and a strawberry shake.  Now days any time some body says, "Let's have hamburgers" we don't even have to ask where we are going.  I just pull up in the Whataburger parking lot.

Food:  Now that I'm diabetic I order the Double Meat burger with a whole wheat bun, extra onions, no fries but I still get the strawberry shake and take my diabetes medicine.  Some things you just can't pass up.  Whataburger is one of them.

data.title: What-A-Burger
data.text: I love whataburger so it's pretty simple to say they are awesome!  But, not all restaurants are kept clean and serve fresh burgers, etc.  Every visit, I've had very fresh, hot food and the staff has always been extremely polite.

data.title: Good Food
data.text: Whataburger is quick, inexpensive, and a Texas favorite. i usually order the kid's meals because it is a good portion for me. The staff never ask any questions or bat an eyelash at that.

data.title: Probably is good...but couldn't find a parking spot
data.text: Since the highway has been under construction, this location has lost half of their parking spots. Maybe OK for drive through, but forget about parking and going in when their busy, especially if you have a truck or SUV.

data.title: YUM
data.text: This Whataburger was walking distance from our hotel. We ate here the first night we arrived and ordered burgers and fries. It took a little longer then it should've but I think they were just busy. The food was good! A couple days later I walked in and ordered a shake. The lady that was working there was the sweetest employee I've met.

data.title: Nice new Whataburger
data.text: So pleased to see the new Whataburger open on West 380!  Love the salad! Location easy to get in & out.
